members.resolution_context: As technology continues to advance and new techniques are developed, the art of forensic science will only become more sophisticated and effective in the years to come.
members.resolution_rationale: Single, well-defined concept with an accurate name and description; no overlapping entities to merge or ambiguity to correct.

resolution_rationale: Represents the overall practice and methodology of forensic science, which is conceptually different from specific techniques and from temporal expressions.

entity_description: An upcoming time period in which forensic science is expected to become more sophisticated and effective.
resolution_context: As technology continues to advance and new techniques are developed, the art of forensic science will only become more sophisticated and effective in the years to come.

members.entity_description: Upcoming time period during which forensic science is expected to grow more effective.
members.resolution_context: As technology continues to advance and new techniques are developed, the art of forensic science will only become more sophisticated and effective in the years to come.
members.resolution_rationale: "Future years" is a time period concept and does not overlap semantically with the technology- or method-related entities.

resolution_rationale: Denotes a future time period in context; it is a temporal expression and not the same as methods or the forensic science domain, so it should remain separate.
